name: Yohans Hailu Kasaw
summary: Frontend Developer with 3+ years of experience specializing in responsive web application development using React, Vue.js, and modern JavaScript. Elite problem-solving skills with top 2.5% LeetCode ranking, adept at debugging complex frontend challenges and optimizing web performance.

entries.title: Frontend Developer
entries.subtitle: Floey
description: Developed responsive frontend interfaces for a comprehensive SaaS gym management platform, creating intuitive booking systems, user dashboards, and trainer management interfaces using Next.js and modern CSS frameworks.

Collaborated with design team to convert Figma mockups into pixel-perfect, responsive web components; integrated payment gateway UIs (Stripe) with seamless user experience and real-time feedback systems.

entries.title: Frontend Developer
entries.subtitle: OwlBox AI
description: Built scalable frontend for AI-driven video annotation platform using Vue.js and TypeScript, implementing responsive design patterns and dynamic component rendering for optimal user interaction across devices.

Collaborated with backend team to integrate RESTful APIs, creating smooth data flow and real-time updates; optimized frontend performance achieving 23.03% improvement in page load speeds through code splitting and lazy loading.

entries.title: Frontend Developer
entries.subtitle: Africa to Silicon Valley
description: Led frontend development for EzyPay payment platform, creating responsive user interfaces with React and Next.js, focusing on mobile-first design and intuitive user flows for financial transactions.

Developed dynamic healthcare platform interfaces using React and Next.js with Tailwind CSS, implementing real-time notifications, social media integration, and responsive video calling components for public health information access.

entries.title: Competitive Programming
entries.subtitle: A2SV
description: Gained mastery of data structures and algorithms with proficiency in Python & Go.
Achieved Top 2.5% LeetCode ratings by solving 1,000+ challenges, demonstrating exceptional problem-solving, teamwork, and dedication.

entries.title: EzyPay
description: Created responsive payment interface for Ethiopia's mobile payment market with focus on accessibility and user experience.
Implemented frontend components with React featuring real-time transaction feedback and intuitive navigation.

entries.title: RateEat
description: Designed and built responsive restaurant rating interface using React and Next.js with emphasis on visual appeal and user engagement.
Converted design mockups into interactive components with smooth animations and mobile-optimized layouts.
Frontend Technologies: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Next.js, Vue.js, Responsive Web Design
CSS Frameworks & Tools: Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, Styled Components, CSS Grid, Flexbox
Development Tools: Git, GitHub, Figma, Visual Studio Code, Chrome DevTools, Webpack, Vite
API Integration: RESTful APIs, JSON, Fetch API, Axios, WebSockets for real-time features
Achieved Top 2.5% in global programming competition (LeetCode), demonstrating exceptional debugging and problem-solving skills applicable to complex frontend challenges.
Won $1000 in A2SV Month-Long Coding Competition, showcasing systematic approach to technical problem resolution.
